info.name: Bild.me kuroi
info.description: This is a black and green version of the website without all the useless text. This is as simplistic as it gets.
info.additionalInfo:
Bild.me is one of my favorite websites, unlike Image shack this website doesn't delete your images. There are no restrictions (size,file-type,quantity...) and the service is available 24/7.
I myself use it for animated GIFs most of the time.
